description: Within the first year at NAVOO, successfully managed, revitalized, and modernized all microfrontends, ensuring the platform's future-readiness. Subsequently, assigned to the Board Management application, I successfully revived the project, adding new features without relying on knowledge transfer from previous developers. This accomplishment showcases my ability to quickly adapt to new projects and drive innovation.

Within four months, was appointed as a key project lead, significantly contributing to a 50% increase in feature delivery and bug resolution. Served as a technical consultant to other teams, ensuring alignment with project requirements and contributing to overall project success.

Successfully led the development of the LiveToGive app, delivering the project on time without sacrificing quality or architectural integrity. Within a year, I oversaw the development of three major projects: LiveToGive, MoonTrekker, and SYF Virtual Exhibition, demonstrating my ability to manage complex projects and deliver results under tight deadlines.

Served as a lead developer on PRIMECore CRM, a critical internal tool connecting sales, leasing, and business development teams. Successfully developed and implemented at least 7 web applications, and led annual website revamps, resulting in a 25-35% increase in website traffic across unique users, recurring users, and page visits. Reported directly to the CEO, playing a pivotal role in shaping the department's yearly budget, innovation goals, and hiring strategies.

Within six months of joining the company, I successfully implemented MIFARE technology card into our Android applications following in-house training provided by NXP. This innovative integration contributed to securing significant projects, demonstrating my ability to quickly learn and apply new technologies to drive business growth.
